003aaa8c-aefa-4c4d-82f9-9b16fb26ac13.description: A developer using MongoDB with their application must possess the knowledge and skills necessary to utilize the database effectively. This means that they must have hands-on experience completing day-to-day operational tasks needed to use MongoDB.
003aaa8c-aefa-4c4d-82f9-9b16fb26ac13.name: MongoDB Associate Developer

badge_template_activities.title: Introduction to MongoDB course (14.5 hours)
Software engineering experience with any programming language and hands on experience using MongoDB as the backing database for an application. (+/- 3 months)

ba29ef50-1330-4a33-b85c-5473ab830786.description: A MongoDB Database Administrator possesses the knowledge and skills necessary to implement, configure, and manage a MongoDB database They have hands-on experience completing day-to-day operational tasks.
ba29ef50-1330-4a33-b85c-5473ab830786.name: MongoDB Associate Database Administrator

badge_template_activities.title: MongoDB Basics (8.5 hours)
Basic Cluster Administration (9.5 hours)
Authentication & Authorization (3.5 hours)
Mongo DB Performance (7 hours)
Diagnostics and Debugging (6 hours)
At least 2 months of consistent experience as a MongoDB DBA

c4fc779a-5a0e-412a-a9c0-006c35854122.description: Developers completing the MongoDB Developer Foundation course have gained a complete set of skills to build sophisticated, high performance MongoDB applications. Learners from this course participated in lessons and hands-on exercises, gaining knowledge in topics like development fundamentals, optimizing storage and retrieval, design skills, and preparing applications for production.
c4fc779a-5a0e-412a-a9c0-006c35854122.name: MongoDB Developer Foundation (DF01)

badge_template_activities.title: Completion of class "MongoDB Fundamentals (DF100)".
Completion of class "Optimizing Storage and Retrieval (DF200)".
Completion of class "Design Skills and Advanced Features (DF300)".
Completion of class "Production-ready Development (DF400)".

5d70d2a5-ec79-448c-941f-65a8403847d5.description: Individuals who complete this 1-day training have a strong understanding of the fundamentals of indexing in theory and in practice, how to profile database operations to identify bottlenecks, the aggregation query language and how to move beyond simple retrieval of raw data to in-database computation. They will know how to avoid common MongoDB mistakes and design their data access for optimal performance.
5d70d2a5-ec79-448c-941f-65a8403847d5.name: Optimizing Storage and Retrieval (DF200)

badge_template_activities.title: Completion of class "Optimizing Storage and Retrieval (DF200)".

0f41b99e-0e67-4d42-aa25-d868e314b4fa.description: Individuals who complete this 1-day training understand a broad set of MongoDB functionality beyond simple storage and retrieval, best practices for application development, and design of application code and database schema — the most important part of a well-written MongoDB application.
0f41b99e-0e67-4d42-aa25-d868e314b4fa.name: Design Skills and Advanced Features (DF300)

badge_template_activities.title: Completion of class "Design Skills and Advanced Features (DF300)".

1111f8df-8157-4bad-a20a-0216d6430ba5.description: Individuals who complete this 1-day training have a strong understanding of what MongoDB is, its strengths and where it should be used. They know how to get MongoDB up and running, as well as using the breadth of powerful functionality for storing and retrieving data.
1111f8df-8157-4bad-a20a-0216d6430ba5.name: MongoDB Developer Fundamentals (DF100)

badge_template_activities.title: Completion of class "MongoDB Developer Fundamentals (DF100)".

fb5e84a5-fb5e-4b69-a0bf-1195b355460a.description: Individuals who have completed this 1-day training will have a strong understanding of the fundamentals of indexing in theory and in practice, how to profile database operations to identify bottlenecks, and how to monitor MongoDB performance in real time using command-line tooling
fb5e84a5-fb5e-4b69-a0bf-1195b355460a.name: Diagnostics and Performance Tuning (OF200)

badge_template_activities.title: Completion of class "Diagnostics and Performance Tuning (OF200)".

72f4cde4-428a-4579-abc8-e342dc6dd550.description: Individuals who have completed this 1-day training will have a strong ability to evaluate and select different MongoDB cluster architectures and key design decisions to meet production system requirements.
72f4cde4-428a-4579-abc8-e342dc6dd550.name: Production System Design (OF300)

badge_template_activities.title: Completion of class "Production System Design (OF300)".

d2fd2686-3f19-431f-82e7-a25047eaef5c.description: Individuals who have completed this 1-day training will have a strong understanding between the difference between an application being fit for production or not. They have the ability to evaluate and make vital deployment decisions that are required when building business-critical, highly available and secure applications.
d2fd2686-3f19-431f-82e7-a25047eaef5c.name: Production-Ready Development (DF400)

badge_template_activities.title: Completion of class "Production-Ready Development (DF400)".

7ff6c1f5-e0db-45d3-9939-c5ba6c66e1e8.description: Individuals who have completed this 1-day MongoDB Atlas training have gained a comprehensive overview of how to deploy and manage clusters in MongoDB Atlas. They have a strong understanding of the key differences of MongoDB Atlas vs on-premise deployments, how to deploy clusters, interact with data, and set up security, monitoring, alerting and backups within MongoDB Atlas.
7ff6c1f5-e0db-45d3-9939-c5ba6c66e1e8.name: MongoDB Atlas (OF400)

badge_template_activities.title: Completion of class "MongoDB Atlas (OF400)".

248bda62-6cfd-480c-9921-6d11f86bdc65.description: Individuals who have completed this 1-day training will have a strong understanding of what MongoDB is and how MongoDB administration compares to managing a traditional RDBMS.
248bda62-6cfd-480c-9921-6d11f86bdc65.name: MongoDB Operations Fundamentals (OF100)

badge_template_activities.title: Completion of class "MongoDB Operations Fundamentals (OF100)".

6354e53b-79b9-4ecb-8639-a93549965d79.description: Operations professionals completing the MongoDB Operations Foundation course have gained a complete set of skills to size, deploy, upgrade, manage and tune MongoDB deployments in a mission-critical environment. Learners from this course participated in lessons and hands-on exercises covering topics like operations fundamentals, diagnostics and performance tuning, backups, replication, sharding, and more, with speciality learning in MongoDB Atlas and the Atlas API.
6354e53b-79b9-4ecb-8639-a93549965d79.name: MongoDB Operations Foundation for MongoDB Atlas (OF01A)

badge_template_activities.title: Completion of class "MongoDB Operations Fundamentals (OF100)".

Completion of class "Production System Design (OF300)".
Completion of class "MongoDB Atlas (OF400)".

c593be1b-0d98-4028-8e5c-a34a5214b438.description: Operations professionals completing the MongoDB Operations Foundation course have gained a complete set of skills to size, deploy, upgrade, manage and tune MongoDB deployments in a mission-critical environment. Learners from this course participated in lessons and hands-on exercises covering topics like operations fundamentals, diagnostics and performance tuning, backups, replication, sharding, and more, with speciality learning in MongoDB Ops Manager and the Ops Manager API.
c593be1b-0d98-4028-8e5c-a34a5214b438.name: MongoDB Operations Foundation for Self-managed MongoDB (OF01S)

badge_template_activities.title: Completion of class "MongoDB Operations Fundamentals (OF100)".

Completion of class "Production System Design (OF300)".
Completion of class "MongoDB Ops Manager (OF450)".

4290f8e8-4157-4876-99f2-44320a18967b.description: Developers completing this advanced class have gained mastery of advanced MongoDB Query API and aggregation features through a series of short but challenging exercises. With this knowledge, they have the skills to achieve far more with MongoDB than merely using it as a data store. developers move through a series of short but challenging exercises using advanced MongoDB Query API and aggregation features.
4290f8e8-4157-4876-99f2-44320a18967b.name: MongoDB Advanced Queries and Data Processing (DA610)

badge_template_activities.title: Completion of class "MongoDB Advanced Queries and Data Processing (DA610)".

a5b783e8-d726-40b6-9f73-8e6efa053a95.description: Developers completing this advanced class have gained mastery in ensuring their MongoDB applications are optimized and high performing. They learned these skills by improving a test application that was working, but unusable with a response time of over 20 seconds. Through an iterative process of improvement, they reduced this down to 20 milliseconds, then gained the skills to optimize it even further.
a5b783e8-d726-40b6-9f73-8e6efa053a95.name: MongoDB Application Optimization (DA640)

badge_template_activities.title: Completion of class "MongoDB Application Optimization (DA640)".

2a223ea0-39fd-48c5-9bce-f40c48574e86.description: Individuals who have completed this 1-day training will be confident using Ops Manager to significantly reduce risk and effort involved in managing one or more production MongoDB clusters. They will have learned how to deploy, monitor, back up, secure, and scale self-managed MongoDB using the Ops Manager management platform
2a223ea0-39fd-48c5-9bce-f40c48574e86.name: MongoDB Ops Manager (OF450)

badge_template_activities.title: Completion of class "MongoDB Ops Manager (OF450)".

62b3173f-2994-425e-bd03-79da12c6f672.description: Individuals who have completed this 1-day training will have the skills to use the Ops Manager API to fully automate tasks in the database lifecycle and integrate MongoDB Ops Manager with other enterprise systems.
62b3173f-2994-425e-bd03-79da12c6f672.name: DevOps with Ops Manager (OF550)

9b7a3885-b71f-40ad-b9f5-76a147ea74db.description: Individuals who have completed this 1-day training will have the skills to use the Atlas API to fully automate tasks in the database lifecycle and integrate MongoDB Atlas with other enterprise systems.
9b7a3885-b71f-40ad-b9f5-76a147ea74db.name: DevOps with MongoDB Atlas (OF500)

4ddba4c0-a65f-437a-b0ec-e66dfe0e038e.description: A developer using MongoDB with their application must possess the knowledge and skills necessary to utilize the database effectively. This means that they must have hands-on experience completing day-to-day operational tasks needed to use MongoDB.
4ddba4c0-a65f-437a-b0ec-e66dfe0e038e.name: MongoDB Associate Developer

badge_template_activities.title: Introduction to MongoDB course (14.5 hours)
MongoDB for Java Developers (3.5 hours)
Software engineering experience with Java and hands on experience using MongoDB as the backing database for an application. (+/- 3 months)

32961d65-c5c7-4b16-a0d5-017dc1be5f73.description: Individuals who have completed this advanced training have gained mastery in best practices for MongoDB benchmarking, knowing how to interpret monitoring metrics in MongoDB Atlas and Ops/Cloud Manager and when to add CPU, RAM, or disk IOPS to improve the performance and cost of their workloads.
32961d65-c5c7-4b16-a0d5-017dc1be5f73.name: Benchmarking and Capacity Planning (OA610)

badge_template_activities.title: Completion of class "Benchmarking and Capacity Planning (OA610)".

e6806e8f-c755-4220-bb36-71c2b966e58d.description: Individuals who have completed this advanced training have gained mastery in building scalable, stateless web services. They understand how different styles of programming language impact the performance, readability and functionality of a web service, and design ways to overcome any limitations.
e6806e8f-c755-4220-bb36-71c2b966e58d.name: Languages, Drivers, Web Services (DA620)

badge_template_activities.title: Completion of class "Languages, Drivers, Web Services (DA620)".

d9059090-3fda-4426-a52a-cbba05a4ac38.description: Individuals who have completed this 1-day training will have a deep understanding of what use cases can be solved using Atlas Search, and how to design and implement search indexes. They know how to run and tune queries, how to augment search results, and how to properly size Atlas to satisfy search capabilities.
d9059090-3fda-4426-a52a-cbba05a4ac38.name: MongoDB Atlas Search (DS110)

badge_template_activities.title: Completion of class "MongoDB Atlas Search (DS110)".

8dc16f40-6c20-49f4-ba61-42cfffdd13e1.description: Individuals who have completed this advanced training have gained mastery in understanding the MongoDB settings that affect speed, latency, durability and business correctness, as well as when to use concerns and transactions in MongoDB.
8dc16f40-6c20-49f4-ba61-42cfffdd13e1.name: Distributed Systems and Transactions (DA630)

badge_template_activities.title: Completion of class "Distributed Systems and Transactions (DA630)".

700ac75e-4b78-4c77-956f-fbef67d0fe8c.description: Individuals who have completed this advanced training have gained mastery in building applications from the ground up that are intended to be long-lived and highly scalable. They know how to create an application that evolves its schema over time to support new business needs without needing to transform older data.
700ac75e-4b78-4c77-956f-fbef67d0fe8c.name: Code Evolution, Scale and Workflow (DA650)

badge_template_activities.title: Completion of class "Code Evolution, Scale and Workflow (DA650)".

bd1fa1af-55bc-42f0-842a-561770d77dde.description: Individuals who have completed this advanced training have gained mastery in installing MongoDB Ops Manager themselves. They know how to implement Ops Manager using the most common configurations, appropriately size hardware for Ops Manager, and complete critical operational tasks like enabling high-availablity and backups using Ops Manager.
bd1fa1af-55bc-42f0-842a-561770d77dde.name: Ops Manager Sizing, Installation and Configuration (OA620)

badge_template_activities.title: Completion of class "Ops Manager Sizing, Installation and Configuration (OA620)".

26e9d788-5c21-476e-b708-bb8fb6ee94af.description: Professionals in possession of this badge are qualified to perform consulting work as a representative of MongoDB Professional Services, providing assurance to customers that they have superior product knowledge and usage experience. The completion of a multi-month partner certification program, on top of having delivered more than 400 hours in shadow engagements and solo delivery in real customer engagements is a recognition of having met the gold standard for MongoDB knowledge and expertise.
26e9d788-5c21-476e-b708-bb8fb6ee94af.name: MongoDB Professional Services: Certified Partner, Consulting Engineer

badge_template_activities.title: Complete 5 weeks of in-depth and advanced technical training on the latest version of MongoDB.
Complete simulated deep technical project work covering common scenarios, use cases, and MongoDB best practices that a Consulting Engineer would typically see in the real world.
Successfully complete a detailed skills and knowledge assessment of MongoDB consulting and technical skills.
Shadow and participate in real customer engagements. with support, coaching and mentoring from seasoned MongoDB Consulting Engineers.

fe77eae3-4b7b-4778-865c-377980b8a7eb.description: Give your operations or DevOps team the skills and tools to run MongoDB with confidence. Ops Manager, available with MongoDB Enterprise Advanced, is the easiest and fastest way to deploy, monitor, back up and scale your MongoDB deployment within your own data center. Learn how to best implement Ops Manager and administer MongoDB with our Operations Rapid Start so that you’re ready to handle production workloads. Includes two days of introductory operations training with hands-on courses.
fe77eae3-4b7b-4778-865c-377980b8a7eb.name: MongoDB Operations Rapid Start (OFR01)

badge_template_activities.title: Completion of two classes in "MongoDB Operations Rapid Start (OFR01)"

5a718ef9-098f-4032-acce-f2be820232e1.description: A developer using MongoDB with their application must possess the knowledge and skills necessary to utilize the database effectively. This means that they must have hands-on experience completing day-to-day operational tasks needed to use MongoDB.
5a718ef9-098f-4032-acce-f2be820232e1.name: MongoDB Associate Developer

badge_template_activities.title: Introduction to MongoDB course (14.5 hours)
MongoDB for C# Developers Course (3.5 hours)
Software engineering experience with C# and hands on experience using MongoDB as the backing database for an application. (+/- 3 months)

de18e0cc-4336-4076-8d23-4cf86c14a145.description: Developing a well-designed data model at the beginning of a project is key to achieving better performance, simplified queries, and optimal infrastructure usage for your application. If you are relatively new to building applications with MongoDB Atlas, a MongoDB Atlas Rapid Start can help you get going quickly. Includes two days of introductory developer training with hands-on courses.
de18e0cc-4336-4076-8d23-4cf86c14a145.name: MongoDB Atlas Rapid Start (DFR02)

badge_template_activities.title: Completion of two classes in "MongoDB Atlas Rapid Start (DFR02)"

49c83958-6a12-4887-9e72-819aa5130f70.description: Application Development Professionals who complete this multi-week certification program are recognized as having met MongoDB's high standards for knowledge and expertise. They are entitled to perform billable customer work as a representative of MongoDB Professional Services, having delivered at least 300 hours of project work in real-life billable customer engagements. This provides assurance to customers that they have superior product knowledge and usage experience.
49c83958-6a12-4887-9e72-819aa5130f70.name: MongoDB Professional Services: Certified Partner, Developer

badge_template_activities.title: Participate in real customer engagements. It requires at least 300 hours of independent project delivery with MongoDB Professional Services.

73be5989-c744-410d-982d-2a0d3e405f01.description: Individuals who have completed this 1-day training will have a deep understanding what use cases can be solved with Atlas Data Federation, and how to do a first-time setup. They also know how to query and manipulate data, how to transfer data between Atlas and S3, and how to use MongoDB Charts to easily visualize data.
73be5989-c744-410d-982d-2a0d3e405f01.name: MongoDB Atlas Data Federation (DS120)

badge_template_activities.title: Completion of class "MongoDB Atlas Data Federation (DS120)".

5eb3cda4-8b0f-4417-98b6-a466dcb263cc.description: Individuals engaging in a Realm Rapid Start participate in both consulting sessions and training days, designed get off to a great start developing their iOS mobile application on MongoDB Realm. badge_template_activities.title: Completion of class "MongoDB Realm Mobile Rapid Start for iOS (RF100J)"

c260abf5-b6de-4169-9491-7dd57de1164d.description: Individuals engaging in a Realm Web Rapid Start participate in both consulting sessions and training days, designed get off to a great start developing their web application on MongoDB Realm with GraphQL or the JavaScript SDK. c260abf5-b6de-4169-9491-7dd57de1164d.name: MongoDB Realm Web Rapid Start (RF100W)

badge_template_activities.title: Completion of class "MongoDB Realm Web Rapid Start (RF100W)"
